summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Flux CRM Sales Pipeline Management system with focus on INR currency, Indian states integration, and admin role functionality. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend successfully tested with user registration, INR formatting, and all major features working correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API User Registration (POST /api/auth/register) - First user becomes admin
Backend API Indian States (GET /api/indian-states) - 33 states found
Backend API Organization Types (GET /api/org-types) - Default + custom types
Backend API Create Custom Organization Type (POST /api/org-types)
Backend API Delete Custom Organization Type (DELETE /api/org-types/{id})
Backend API Lead Stages (GET /api/lead-stages) - Default + custom stages
Backend API Create Custom Lead Stage (POST /api/lead-stages)
Backend API Delete Custom Lead Stage (DELETE /api/lead-stages/{id})
Backend API Create Organization with Indian State (POST /api/organizations)
Backend API Create Lead with INR Pricing (POST /api/leads)
Backend API Create Document with Custom Name (POST /api/documents)
Backend API Dashboard Analytics with INR Data (GET /api/analytics/dashboard)
Backend API Geography Analytics with Indian States (GET /api/analytics/geography)
Frontend User Registration Flow - First user becomes admin
Frontend Dashboard Loading with INR Currency Formatting (₹)
Frontend Dashboard Data Load Metrics (Daily/Monthly Data Load)
Frontend Organizations with Indian States Integration
Frontend Geography Page with India Map
Frontend Lead Detail Page with Computed Metrics

success_percentage.backend: 100% (32/32 core API tests passed + 10/10 specific feature tests passed)
